reviewText: Clifford books are so well loved at our house - we have read many times and it will be one that we will share as others come along
I love to watch this series with my toddler.
Delivery was good but has the wrong dvd in case.
Bought this as a Christmas gift for our 4 year old. He and his 2 year old brother LOVE this movie. We have had to watch it many times already.
Good Wholesome show for kids. No Violence, sex, drugs and so on. Plus my Son loves it, I have bought as many as I can and he still wants more
My kids love Clifford and it teaches them great values! This movie was good diff shows all in one movie.
My granddaughter loves the Clifford videos. And I love them because they are good clean fun with great lessons in each episode. Perfect entertainment for young ones.

I got this item as a Christmas gift for my nephew.  I also got several other Clifford items.  He Loved it.  Item arrived very fast and I was glad that it was shipped with many other items to conserve my shipping.
Service is always top knotch at Amazon, fast and accurate. My 1 1/2 year old grandson Luke squealed with excitement when he opened the 2 new DVD's I bought him for CHRISTmas. Thanks
